page.title: 08Sidmouth College.
page.content: {Sidmouth College}is a Community College, which means that the College's facilities are used by the whole community.{Primley Library}is on the site of the College and is open to the public as well as being used by pupils and teachers. The College is a hive of activity all day and all year, with evening classes taking over from the classes of the normal school day. Sidmouth College offers a wide range of subjects including outdoor activities and has the right facilities to extend the students' abilities. Before the summer holidays the pupils spend a week on{Project Week,}when they pursue interests ranging from surfing to horse riding. Most of the teachers are quite nice and are easy to get on with, provided you do as you are told and listen!
